Reviews.Title: BUY this item if you like a problems!!!
Reviews.Author: Zekie
Reviews.Content: Item and box looks like second hand. Some parts are missing. Seller promises to send the missing parts, never did. It's look like money in the bin.I am hate it very muchthis is item is not working because adapter is missing, and cd and ...My recommendation is DO NOT BUYP.S. This was my birthday gift. :-(

ProductInfo.Features:
Rechargeable Li-ion Battery
Four separate one-touch recording functions
Stealth mode that allows user to turn off the screen while recording
Easy to use for pros and novices alike
